comments.body: Switching this to use AntD dropdown to avoid it being covered by load more bar
This line changes `Display in own column` to `Display as a separate column`. @stbof

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +59,63 @@              </Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item onClick={this.handleRemoveBagged}>
                Display as a separate column
              </Menu.Item>
            </Menu>

comments.body:
We introduce the notion of a canonical key, like

```
metrics.`foo`
```

This allows a column to directly reference the data that produces it.

In general, I converted the structural notion of SortState to a pair of (canonicalKey, isAscending). This allows us to refer to tags in addition to attributes, metrics, and params (which the previous "isParam" and "isMetric" booleans were insufficient to do) and more closely matches the REST API.
